description:
** "A must-have killer productivity app" as covered by Time, HuffPost, Fast Company and Mashable. **
** Over 8 million downloads, 85 million documents created**
Create, edit and share awesome docs by using your fingers to tap, type, click and swipe - it’s easy and intuitive. Connect to a storage provider, access your docs and get stuff done. And of course, it’s all compatible with Microsoft Word docs (DOCX). 
 
Create docs easily - it’s at your fingertips!
• Create, review, edit and share Microsoft Word docs.
• Insert tables and pictures easily. Rotate, flip and scale them up or down. And do all this simply with gestures.
• Use the in-doc camera to take a picture directly from your doc.
• Move text by dragging it around within your doc.
 
Organize your docs - so what if they’re all over the place?
• Connect to your storage provider (Dropbox, Box, Google Drive and One Drive) and access your docs.
• Find a doc you’re looking for simply by searching for it.
• Move, duplicate, rename or delete docs across folders.
• Save automatically and never lose your stuff.
• Access your docs even when you’re offline.
 
Read docs, presentations and spreadsheets 
• Bigger, cleaner interface thats easy on your eyes.
• Exceptional clarity - beats your HDTV.
• It plays nice with Microsoft Office - it’s fully compatible.

It’s all about teamwork
• Share docs with teammates even if they use different storage providers.
• Get notified when someone reads the docs you share.
• Start conversations around your doc in the Workfeed.

Go CloudOn Pro
 Print docs - AirPrint DOCX, PPTX and XLSX docs directly from your iPad. 
 Export and share docs as PDF’s.
 Password protect your docs.
 Create a passcode to control access to your app.

Should you have any questions please contact us at help@cloudon.com
trackCensoredName: CloudOn (Doc Editor compatible with Microsoft Word documents)
trackName: CloudOn (Doc Editor compatible with Microsoft Word documents)
releaseNotes:
We have made a bunch of improvements for the new ipad app:
• The app launches much faster, like a rocket!
• Send docs now directly from local storage
• Tighter integration with Box (round-trip editing from Box app)
• New, easier-to-manage handles for extending text selections
• Several improvements to reading docs from your browser
• Fixed issues with adding and deleting people when sharing a doc
• Many other bug fixes and stability enhancements you'll love
